entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning in the morning then changing to periods of snow late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
